Description: Ribbed blue glass spindle whorl or spacer-bead; cast; large central perforation with a raised lip, from which radiate ribs at regular interbals; the edge is broken in two places.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Turner Bequest Excavations, Amathus (probably)
Curator's comments: Tomb 276 was not allocated to the BM, but this item seems to have have been separated from the main body of material.
